name: UFO Cats Basketball? (A Game aDay: Day 14)
name_original: UFO Cats Basketball? (A Game aDay: Day 14)
description:
UFO Cats Basketball?

Try to beam all the cats into the hoop within 30 seconds. This is a short demo of something I wanted to make for some friends. It's very much unfinished.Enjoy! 

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys
Use Beam - Space Bar

This is the 13th game of my Game a Day challenge. I'll be making a game from scratch every single day until July 1st. To learn more about it, click this link. https://anxietymonstergames.wordpress.com/2018/06/01/a-game-a-day-blog/
